languages.text:
"Холодная безжалостность интриг
Дыханье обращает в иней вмиг!"

traits.locale_text:
"Холодная безжалостность интриг
Дыханье обращает в иней вмиг!"

languages.text:
"Sly intrigue's ruthless chill to jagged ice
Turns lips, and tongues, and breath — all in a trice."
languages.original_text:
"Холодная безжалостность интриг
Дыханье обращает в иней вмиг!"

traits.locale_text:
"Intrigue's dispassionate and frightening caress
Suffuses blood with ice and chills the mon-keigh's breath!"

"Intrigue's dispassionate and frightening caress
Suffuses blood with ice and chills the mon-keigh's breath!"

"Intrigue's dispassionate and frightening caress
Suffuses blood with ice and chills the mon-keigh's breath!"

"Intrigue's dispassionate and frightening caress
Suffuses blood with ice and chills the mon-keigh's breath!"

"Sly intrigue's ruthless chill to jagged ice
Turns lips, and tongues, and breath — all in a trice."

"Sly intrigue's ruthless chill to jagged ice
Turns lips, and tongues, and breath — all in a trice."

languages.text:
« L'intrigue, dans son frisson impitoyable et terrifiant,
Glace les lèvres, les langues et le souffle en un rien de temps. »
languages.original_text:
"Sly intrigue's ruthless chill to jagged ice
Turns lips, and tongues, and breath — all in a trice."

traits.locale_text:
« La caresse terrifiante et sans passion des intrigues
Glace le sang et gèle le souffle des mon-keigh ! »

languages.text:
“阴谋的无情罗网结成了冰幕，
令所有唇舌与呼吸为之凝固。”
languages.original_text:
"Sly intrigue's ruthless chill to jagged ice
Turns lips, and tongues, and breath — all in a trice."

traits.locale_text:
“令人畏惧的爱抚，勾心斗角的冷静。
冻住猴子的血液，将呼吸凝成了冰！”

languages.text:
「狡猾な陰謀の無慈悲な冷たさが、唇、舌、
そして息を一瞬で鋭い氷に変える」
languages.original_text:
"Sly intrigue's ruthless chill to jagged ice
Turns lips, and tongues, and breath — all in a trice."

traits.locale_text:
「狡猾な陰謀の無慈悲な冷たさが、唇、舌、
そして息を一瞬で鋭い氷に変える」

languages.text:
"Eisige Intrige gefriert zu Eis
Lippen und Zunge und Atem zugleich."
languages.original_text:
"Sly intrigue's ruthless chill to jagged ice
Turns lips, and tongues, and breath — all in a trice."

traits.locale_text:
"Die leidenschaftslose und erschreckende Liebkosung der Intrige
Lässt das Blut erfrieren und den Atem {mf|des|der} Chem-Pan-Sey erstarren!"

languages.text:
«El frío inclemente de la traicionera intriga se vuelve cortante:
los labios, la lengua y el aliento desgarra en tan solo un instante».
languages.original_text:
"Sly intrigue's ruthless chill to jagged ice
Turns lips, and tongues, and breath — all in a trice."

traits.locale_text:
"¡La impasible y terrorífica caricia de la confabulación
hiela la sangre {mf|del|de la} mon-keigh y atenaza su corazón!».

languages.text:
"Aman vermeyen sinsi entrikaların soğuk nefesi,
Kaşla göz arasında herkesin düşer çenesi."
languages.original_text:
"Sly intrigue's ruthless chill to jagged ice
Turns lips, and tongues, and breath — all in a trice."

traits.locale_text:
"Aman vermez sinsi entrikaların soğuk nefesi,
Kaşla göz arasında herkesin düşer çenesi."
